hero.title: Our Projects
hero.subtitle: Portfolio of Excellence
hero.description: Explore our diverse portfolio of successfully delivered industrial and commercial projects across India.

projects.title: Helious Specialty Gases
projects.description: A comprehensive industrial gas manufacturing facility designed with focus on safety, efficiency, and regulatory compliance. The project included complete architectural design, structural engineering, MEP systems, and specialized gas handling infrastructure.
projects.shortDescription: Industrial gas manufacturing facility with specialized infrastructure for gas processing and storage.

testimonial.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonial.content: AdroitGrow delivered our facility ahead of schedule with exceptional attention to safety requirements.

projects.title: Helious Specialty Gases
projects.description: Expansion facility for Helious Specialty Gases in Hyderabad, designed to meet growing demand in the southern region. The project incorporated lessons from the Ghiloth facility while adapting to local requirements.
projects.shortDescription: Regional expansion facility for specialty gas manufacturing and distribution.

projects.title: Unique Bimetal Industries
projects.description: Manufacturing facility for Unique Bimetal Industries specializing in precision engineering components. The design focused on optimizing production flow while ensuring worker comfort and safety.
projects.shortDescription: Precision manufacturing facility with optimized production layout and worker amenities.

projects.title: Grindlays Engine Parts
projects.description: Turnkey design-build project for an automotive component manufacturing facility. The project was delivered under accelerated timelines to meet the client's market requirements.
projects.shortDescription: Automotive component manufacturing facility delivered through design-build approach.

projects.title: Ample Auto Tech
projects.description: Automotive manufacturing facility in the heart of Manesar's industrial belt. The design incorporated specific requirements for automotive component production including clean room areas and testing zones.
projects.shortDescription: Automotive manufacturing facility with specialized production and testing areas.

testimonial.name: Priya Sharma
testimonial.content: Working with AdroitGrow was a seamless experience. They understood our automotive requirements perfectly.

projects.title: Ajay Air Products
projects.description: Project management services for an industrial air products facility. Our role included coordinating multiple contractors and ensuring timely delivery of this complex project.
projects.shortDescription: Project management for industrial air products manufacturing facility.

projects.title: JMD Scientific Equipment
projects.description: Specialized facility for scientific equipment manufacturing requiring controlled environment conditions and precision assembly areas.
projects.shortDescription: Scientific equipment manufacturing facility with controlled environment zones.

projects.title: DLF Corporate Green
projects.description: Premium corporate office interior design and execution for a leading enterprise at DLF Corporate Green. The project showcased modern workspace design with focus on employee well-being.
projects.shortDescription: Premium corporate office interior with modern workspace design elements.

projects.title: Olympus Corporate Interior
projects.description: Corporate office interior for Olympus reflecting the brand's values of precision and innovation. The design incorporated Japanese design principles with modern functionality.
projects.shortDescription: Corporate interior reflecting brand values of precision and innovation.

projects.title: Sonepar Office Interior
projects.description: Office interior fitout for Sonepar, a global leader in electrical distribution. The design focused on creating a collaborative work environment with flexible spaces.
projects.shortDescription: Collaborative workspace design with flexible work areas and modern amenities.

projects.title: Star Specialty Gases
projects.description: Design-build project for specialty gas manufacturing and storage facility. The project emphasized safety systems and compliance with hazardous material handling regulations.
projects.shortDescription: Specialty gas facility with advanced safety systems and regulatory compliance.
